paragraphs.text: And remember: Focus determines the quality of your life. No focus means no control of your attention. And no control means frustration. We all know what frustration leads to.
paragraphs.name: a9a7

paragraphs.text: We falsely believe that we can manage time. But time can’t be managed. The only thing you control is your attention.

content.subtitle: Your phone must be there for your convenience…not others — if you reply in an instant to every person or a new relationship in your life…

paragraphs.text: a great starting point too is meditation — meditation is focus — to focus on breathing alone — to anchor your thought or focus to your breath — once you master this natural process you will be able to access this ATTENTION anytime of the day and night —
